titleStmt.title: Commonwealth of Kentucky v. William M. Riddle, Indictment
CWG7289

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's official correspondence file, petitions for pardons, remissions, and respites 1863-1867

body.p:
November term 1863
Estill Circt Court
The Commonwealth of Kentucky
Against } Indictment
Wm M Riddle

The grand Jury of Estill County in the name and by the authority of the Commonwealth of Kentucky accuse Wm M Riddell of the Crime of Treason against the Commonwealth of Kentucky Committed as folows viz The Said Wm M Riddell did on the 5th day of November 1863 in the County aforesaid levy war against the Commonwealth of Kentucky and did adhere to its enemies giving them aid and Comfort against the peace & dignity of the Commonwealth of Kentucky

A Copy attest
E Herndon C E C C

Commonwealth
vs } ^Copy^ Indictment
Wm M Riddell
